summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Herbal Face Tonic from Ere Perez revives skin with every spritz. A refreshing pick-me-up botanical mist that balances, instantly tones and hydrates. With green tea, witch hazel, geranium, aloe vera & hyaluronic acid to enhance luminosity.
details: DetailsBenefitsRevive, refresh & tone skinHydrating daily mistHelps balance skin pHSustainably packaged: mono materials to ensure they get recycled efficiently100% glass bottle is infinitely recyclableKey IngredientsGeranium oil - evens skin tone & reduces blemishesGreen tea extract - fights signs of ageingHyaluronic acid - moisture & collagen promotionItem 2588771How To UseTo tone: spray on cotton pad and wipe evenly across face and neck.To refresh: spray 2-3 spritz over face over makeup when you need an uplifting boost!Can be applied over makeup.In case of irritation discontinue use immediately. Due to the stimulating ingredients in this product, you may feel a slight tingling or the skin may appear red fir a few seconds, this is perfectly normal.IngredientsAqua, Glycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Cold Pressed Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch-Hazel) Leaf Extract, Lactic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Polyglyceryl-5 Oleate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Hyaluronate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To tone: spray on cotton pad and wipe evenly across face and neck.To refresh: spray 2-3 spritz over face over makeup when you need an uplifting boost!Can be applied over makeup.In case of irritation discontinue use immediately. Due to the stimulating ingredients in this product, you may feel a slight tingling or the skin may appear red fir a few seconds, this is perfectly normal.
ingredients: Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Cold Pressed Oil
Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I love this face spray, works perfectly for moisturizing my face in the morning.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: This toner is excellent. It smells good and is clean and natural. I consider it a holy  grail product. I think it nourishes my skin. I will forever be a fan.

reviews.headline: Absolutely in loveâ€¦
reviews.comments: I was on the search for a gentle toner that was effective and would not break out my acne prone skin. This is it! This tonic smells amazing, is hydrating, cleans my skin and totally no breakouts. I am obsessed.

reviews.headline: Super fresh super good
reviews.comments: I really love this face tonic, super natural feeling so fresh
